articles.description: Hollywood star George Clooney plays a post-apocalyptic survivor in his latest movie but dieting for the role led to health issues.

articles.author: Harriet Johnston, Amie Gordon
articles.title: Johnny Depp keeps Dior contract despite losing 'wife beater' trial - Daily Mail
articles.description: Domestic abuse lawyer Rachel Horman-Brown told MailOnline it was 'disappointing and irresponsible' that the high-end brand continues to work with the American actor.
articles.content:
Domestic abuse charities and campaigners have slammed Dior today as it continues to stick by Johnny Depp after he lost his 'wife beater' libel trial.

articles.description: Billy Devine wanted to surprise his mother Jane by singing her favourite song.
articles.content:
media captionBoy sings to dying mum 'for final time'
A boy performed a duet with a friend in a hospice garden so his dying mother could hear him sing one last time.

articles.title: Three groups of people won't be given the new Covid vaccine - Wales Online
articles.description: There is up to date advice from the JCVI and the MHRA
